amendment.description: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 relating to improving student academic achievement in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2138 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2138 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Klobuchar to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S4922-4923; text: CR S4923) To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 relating to improving student academic achievement in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2138 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2138 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Klobuchar to Amendment SA 2089.
